faqs.question: What if I don't like the first design?
faqs.answer: Great question. Our process includes a revision phase for that. We'll work with you to adjust everything until the page is perfectly aligned with your vision.

faqs.question: How do you deliver such good results in 5 days?
faqs.answer: It's not luck, it's method. Our strategic briefing captures all your needs upfront. This eliminates rework and allows us to focus 100% on perfect execution.

faqs.question: Do I need to understand technology for my domain to work?
faqs.answer: Not at all. We give you the exact step-by-step. It's easier than posting a photo on Instagram.

faqs.question: Will I own the page?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. In the end, the most important digital asset of your business is 100% yours, with no strings or monthly fees.

faqs.question: What's included in hosting? And after 1 year?
faqs.answer: Yes, 1 year of high-performance hosting is included. After that, to keep everything running with the same quality, the cost is just $3/month, no surprises.

faqs.question: Will my page really be fast?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We're obsessed with speed. We deliver your page with maximum performance (Grade A on GTmetrix) so you don't lose any sales due to slowness.

faqs.question: Is the page secure for my customers? (SSL)
faqs.answer: Totally. All pages come with SSL Certificate (the security "padlock") activated. This protects data and conveys professionalism and trust.

faqs.question: How do I receive customer contacts?
faqs.answer: Automatically to your email. We configure the form so that with each new lead, you're notified instantly. Simple as that.

faqs.question: Can I sell products directly on the page?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our Pro and Premium Plans allow you to integrate a complete and secure checkout to sell your products or courses automatically and without hassle.

faqs.question: What if I need help after delivery?
faqs.answer: We don't disappear. You'll have access to our support via email to resolve any questions and ensure your page continues working perfectly.
